Sentencas: A novel structured mixed ionic and electronic conducting cathode was developed based on the (LaSr)MnO3 (LSM) electronic conducting structure impregnated with Gd-doped CeO2 (GDC) ionic conducting phase.
Titulo: Novel structured mixed ionic and electronic conducting cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The ion impregnation of oxygen ion conducting GDC phase significantly enhances the electrocatalytic activity of the LSM electrodes for the O-2 reduction reactions and eliminates the activation effects of the cathodic polarization associated with pure LSM.
Titulo: Novel structured mixed ionic and electronic conducting cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With impregnation of 5.8 mg cm(2) GDC in the LSM electrode coating, the electrode showed much lower electrode polarization resistance (R-E) as compared to those of LSM/Y2O3-ZrO2 and LSM/GDC composite cathodes and the performance was comparable with those of mixed ionic and electronic conducting oxides such as (LaSr)(CoFe)O-3 and (GdSr)CoO3.
Titulo: Novel structured mixed ionic and electronic conducting cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This is most likely due to the unique combination of the high electronic conducting LSM porous structure with high ionic conducting nano-sized GDC phase.
Titulo: Novel structured mixed ionic and electronic conducting cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results demonstrated that high oxygen ion conductivity can be developed into conventional and dominant electronic conducting LSM materials by the simple ion impregnation method.
Titulo: Novel structured mixed ionic and electronic conducting cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells
Novel structured mixed ionic and electronic conducting cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells
